---
name: Bug Report
about: Something is not working as expected
title: "[Bug] "
labels: bug
---

## Skill

Which skill is affected? (name and version, or "CLI" for CLI issues)

## Expected Behavior

What should happen? Be specific.

## Actual Behavior

What happens instead? Include exact error messages if applicable.

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Run `arcana install <skill-name>`
2. Use the skill with `/<skill-name>`
3. ...

## Environment

- Arcana CLI version: (run `arcana --version`)
- Platform: (Claude Code / Cursor / Codex CLI / other)
- OS: (Windows / macOS / Linux)
- Node.js version: (run `node --version`)
- Shell: (bash / zsh / PowerShell / Git Bash)

## Additional Context

Anything else? Screenshots, logs, related issues.
